userestrict.head: Publication Rights:
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Levi Stowell pocket diary : transcript, M0087, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHY
bioghist.p: Levi Stowell, born in Colesville, New York in 1820, travelled to California in 1849. He died in San Francisco 18 May 1855.

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: Summary: Transcript of a pocket diary kept during a trip from Washington, D.C. to California by ship via the Panama Isthmus in 1849.
